title: Projects
text:
Kidney prediction model (KIDMO)—Clinical prediction model for prognosis in kidney-transplanted patients.




Schematic overview of the multivariable prediction models and the data sources involved.



Ex vivo allograft monitoring (EXAM)—Data analysis and quality control during ex vivo perfusion.

title: About me
text:
My main responsibilities at Swisstransplant are risk prediction in organ transplantation, developing novel tools to assist quality control, and statistical reporting of the transplantation activity in Switzerland.
I am also a member of the scientific committee of the Swiss Transplant Cohort Study (STCS) and a founding member of the interest group Statistics in Organ Transplantation (SOT).
